org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.firmware

Class FirmwareBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.firmware.FirmwareBuilder

  • @NonNullByDefault
public final class FirmwareBuilder
extends Object
    The builder to create a Firmware.
    Author:
    Thomas HÃ¶fer - Initial contribution, Dimitar Ivanov - Extracted as separate class for Firmware, introduced firmware restriction function

        Parameters:

      • build

        public Firmware build()
        Builds the firmware.
        Returns:
        the firmware instance based on this builder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when the model restricted property (withModelRestricted(boolean)) is set to true, but the model (withModel(String)) is not set
